thread.title: Paul C of Fairfax, Virginia
thread.title_full: Bullion Exchanges reviewed by Paul C of Fairfax, Virginia

author: Paul C of Fairfax, Virginia
title: Paul C of Fairfax, Virginia
text:
I bought a couple lunar year gold coins and some silver coins from Bullion Exchanges and they were shipped promptly after the checks were cleared. Everything was well packed and all were as expected. No complain there.
The one thing I wish Bullion Exchange would do for its customers is to allow e-check where the fund is drawn from the bank instead of mailing a physical check. Mailing paper check is just a drag. Come on Bullion Change, set up an e-check option please.
